name: A sturdy grey robe
data: It increases the users wisdom magnificently.
It increases the users intelligence magnificently.
It has nice armour class for its type (great in general).
It allows the user to see in darkness.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impossibly much.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'unholy strength'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
It decreases the users fire resistance adequately.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance adequately.
